title: Americana
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Stafford 'humbles' himself to Super Bowl win, 'G-Funk' Halftime Show!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones shares his thoughts on Super Bowl Sunday, including QB Matthew Stafford "humbling himself" enough to get the Rams over the top against the Bengals (1:33) and why getting the long advocated for "G-Funk" Halftime was so surreal (12:50). Plus, an IYHH including a crypto-laundering rapper named "Razzlekhan" (25:41) and your voicemails from getting caught sneaking into places (38:07)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @bxchen shares that a change by Apple is tormenting internet companies, especially Meta: https://nyti.ms/34TLe99
  2. @julianamkaplan shares that school cafeterias are dealing with labor shortages that make it hard to feed students: https://bit.ly/3rNBwy0
